content:
The bass player builds the house that all the other players get to live in.
– Abe Laboriel Sr.
As a bassist, I love adding depth, movement, and emotion to songs. Gospel music has particularly shaped me – it’s where I learned to play with groove, dynamics, and expression, and to explore the full range of intensity. I bring this musical approach to every context – whether it’s pop, rock, funk, or soul.
I work live and in the studio with a diverse range of artists, finding the perfect bass sound for each song: from earthy and understated to present and powerful. My goal is always the same: to support the song and bring it to life.

Whether it’s a catchy pop song, a powerful rock track, a touching singer-songwriter piece, or a vibrant gospel anthem – as a producer, my job is to bring your musical vision to life. I’ll guide you from the initial idea to the final master, with years of experience and a keen ear for sound and style. In my studio in the heart of Berlin, we can record vocals and instruments directly. My focus is on creating an authentic, emotional soundscape that suits you and your music. Together, we’ll create productions that touch hearts, move souls, and stay with listeners.

title: Music production

content:
My label renzwertig provides artists with the freedom to focus entirely on their music – I take care of the administrative tasks in the background. This includes registering recordings with GEMA and GVL, assigning ISRC codes for accurate tracking of works, and coordinating with the pressing plant for physical releases. I also ensure professional publication of music on all relevant streaming platforms. Additionally, I can register songs suitable for use in Christian communities with CCLI.
